reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Support the National HIV and Tuberculosis Programmes in scaling up treatment and care services nationwide

description.narrative: Djibouti - TB/HIV - United Nations Development Programme - UNDP Djibouti. This program has the following goals: To reduce the prevalence of tuberculosis by 25% by 2025. To halve new HIV infections by 2022. To improve the life expectancy and quality of life for people infected and affected by HIV and comorbidity agents. The objectives of this program are: To improve screening for new cases of tuberculosis with a view to reporting 3200 new cases by 2020. To improve treatment success to achieve a rate in excess of 85% from 2016 and to maintain it at that level until 2020. To ensure that the prevalence of primary resistance amongst new cases does not exceed 1.8% between now and 2020. To reduce the death rate among cases of co-infection from 17% to 15% by 2020. For the incidence of HIV to halve by 2022. For the HIV mortality rate to be reduced by 70% by 2022

title.narrative: Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
Number of people who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Number of TB cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB notified
Number of notified cases of all forms of TB (i.e. bacteriologically confirmed + clinically diagnosed), new and relapse cases

Treatment success rate- all forms: Percentage of TB cases, all forms, bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, successfully treated (cured plus treatment completed) among all TB cases registered for treatment during a specified period, new and relapse cases
Number of cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB that began second-line treatment
Percentage of HIV-positive women who received ART during pregnancy and/or labour and delivery
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART, who have a suppressed viral load at 12 months (<1000 copies/ml)
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
